about_the_game:
Perform as a 2D VTuber with Inochi2D and Mannequin Character Generator models!

Puppetstring implements webcam face tracking, mouse cursor tracking, keyboard control and other tracking options alongside renderer for your Inochi2D (the open source alternative to Live2D) models.





More to come as we go through early access period to make it on par with other 2D VTuber apps!

You can make your own custom model using our other app, Mannequin Character Generator! Alternatively, start from scratch using your own art by using Inochi Creator, the official Inochi2D rigging app.

  • Please note that Inochi2D is not compatible in any way with Live2D, it uses a different file format altogether.
  • Puppetstring is not part of the official Inochi2D project. If you like the technology itself, consider supporting them by following the links available in Puppetstring's 'About' menu.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Ubuntu 14.04+, Debian 8+, openSUSE 13.3+, or Fedora Linux 24+
  • Processor: Quad-Core, 1.2 GHz 64-bit processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Ryzen Laptop/G-series Desktop Integrated Graphics, Intel ARC integrated graphics, or better
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-bit Ubuntu 14.04+, Debian 8+, openSUSE 13.3+, or Fedora Linux 24+
  • Processor: Quad-Core, 1.6 GHz 64-bit processor
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Ryzen Laptop/G-series Desktop Integrated Graphics, Intel ARC integrated graphics, or better
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
